about_the_game:
"This is our first game. We made it fairly quick just to see if we could. We have both learned so much throughout this whole project; and hope to bring you more exciting things in the future. We are currently working on our next game. Your feedback will help us make our next game even better!"- Gabby and Pique

Step into the shoes of a delivery driver in a quiet suburban town.

The neighborhood is familiar, the streets are calm, and each delivery feels routine...until it isn't. As you make one last delivery to an unassuming house, everything changes. Suddenly, you find yourself taken far from the safety of the suburban streets, and plunged into a twisted environment where escape feels impossible.

With no idea where you are or who brought you here, you'll need to explore dark corridors and find hidden items, as you piece together clues about your captor's intentions. Can you make it back to the life you knew, or will this be your final delivery?

Key Features:

  • Immersive Horror: Unsettling environments

  • Hidden Objects: Look for hidden objects to unravel the mystery and find your way out.

  • Dynamic Exploration: Navigate through multi-layered, interactive spaces that keep you on edge with each turn.

Make it through the night, and you just might make it out.

content_descriptors.notes: All mature content in this game refers to blood stains and dead bodies.

name: Deliverance

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows
  • Processor: 1GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 or later
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: N/A

short_description: Deliverance puts you in the role of a delivery driver on a routine night shift. But when one last delivery leads to a shocking twist, you’re trapped in a nightmare. Navigate dark corridors, find hidden objects, and uncover a sinister mystery as you fight to escape.
